scripts.dev: concurrently -n proxy,sandbox -c blue,green "npm run dev -w proxy" "npm run dev -w sandbox"
scripts.demo:clean: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p=require('path');const d='data';if(fs.existsSync(d)){fs.readdirSync(d).filter(f=>f.endsWith('.json')||f.endsWith('.jsonl')).forEach(f=>fs.unlinkSync(p.join(d,f)))}" && echo Data cleared && npm run demo
scripts.demo:full: npm run demo:clean && npm run demo
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:extension
scripts.typecheck: tsc --noEmit -p proxy/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p sandbox/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p sdk/tsconfig.json
scripts.typecheck:all: npm run typecheck && npm run build:extension
